overview.description: Haryana, located in northern India, is known for its agricultural prosperity, historical sites, and modern cities. Established as a state on November 1, 1966, it features attractions like Kurukshetra and the Sultanpur Bird Sanctuary.

top_destinations.name: Kurukshetra
top_destinations.description: A sacred city linked to the Mahabharata with Jyotisar and Brahma Sarovar.
top_destinations.travel_tips: Visit during Gita Jayanti; carry comfortable shoes.

top_destinations.name: Chandigarh
top_destinations.description: A planned city with the Rock Garden and Sukhna Lake.
top_destinations.travel_tips: Explore the Rock Garden; rent a bike.

top_destinations.name: Sultanpur Bird Sanctuary
top_destinations.description: A haven for migratory birds near Gurugram.

accommodation.name: Taj Chandigarh
accommodation.description: Luxurious stay in the heart of Chandigarh.

culinary_delights.name: The Haveli
culinary_delights.description: Authentic Haryanvi cuisine with a rustic vibe.

culinary_delights.name: Punjabi Tadka
culinary_delights.description: Known for tandoori and butter chicken.

culinary_delights.name: Barbeque Nation
culinary_delights.description: Offers a variety of grilled dishes.

culinary_delights.name: Cafe Coffee Day
culinary_delights.description: Cozy spot for coffee and snacks.

must_visit_spots.name: Jyotisar
must_visit_spots.description: The sacred spot where the Bhagavad Gita was recited.
must_visit_spots.tip: Visit during Gita Jayanti for a spiritual experience.

must_visit_spots.name: Sukhna Lake
must_visit_spots.description: A serene lake perfect for boating and walks.
must_visit_spots.tip: Enjoy a boat ride in the evening.

must_visit_spots.name: Rock Garden
must_visit_spots.description: An artistic park made from recycled materials.
must_visit_spots.tip: Explore the hidden sculptures and caves.

must_visit_spots.name: Morni Hills
must_visit_spots.description: A scenic hill station with lush greenery.

must_visit_spots.name: Panipat
must_visit_spots.description: A historic city known for the Battles of Panipat.
must_visit_spots.tip: Visit the Panipat Museum for history buffs.

must_visit_spots.name: Damdama Lake
must_visit_spots.description: A picturesque lake for water sports and camping.
must_visit_spots.tip: Plan a day trip for adventure activities.

travel_essentials.how_to_reach: By road: Chandigarh is 250 km from Delhi (NH44, 4-5 hrs). By train: Chandigarh Junction connects major cities. By air: Shaheed Bhagat Singh Airport (Chandigarh).
travel_essentials.tips: Carry light clothing; book accommodations in advance.
